channel.title: Still cant change Initial Spawn point... wtf

item.title: Still cant change Initial Spawn point... wtf
item.dc:creator: @Slashx123 Slashx123
item.description:
@Slashx123 wrote:

[code]// initial x and y coordinates of the player
heightLevel = 0;
// the first call to updateThisPlayerMovement() will craft the proper initialization packet
teleportToX = 3210; // 3210;
teleportToY = 3424; // 3424;

    // client initially doesn't know those values yet
    absX = absY = -1;
    mapRegionX = mapRegionY = -1;
    currentX = currentY = 0;
    resetWalkingQueue();
}[/code]

Thats what im working with, in Players.txt and the coords are what i want new players to start at but it doesnt workâ€¦

Read full topic
item.source: Still cant change Initial Spawn point... wtf
